name: mixpost
description: Mixpost is an open-source social media management tool for scheduling and publishing content across multiple platforms. It features content calendars, team collaboration, and a modern web UI for marketing workflows.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Schedule and publish content to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn from one interface

features.title: Content Calendar
features.description: Visualize scheduled posts across all platforms in a calendar view for strategic planning

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Store and organize images, videos, and other assets for reuse across multiple social posts

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Assign roles and permissions to team members for content creation, approval, and publishing workflows

features.title: Draft Management
features.description: Save work-in-progress posts and collaborate on content before scheduling for publication

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor post performance with engagement metrics and audience insights across platforms

features.title: Hashtag Management
features.description: Save and organize hashtag sets for consistent branding and improved content discoverability
